instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> turns on and cpuvcore is present but no image
threads.message:
Hello,
Would any one be so kind to help with this issue that i'm facing, please.
A logicboard <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> has green light on the charger and it turns on but there is no video.
I measured :
<CHIP>U9000</CHIP> pin 2 and 3 have 3,42.
and <SIGNAL>LCD_IG_PWR_EN</SIGNAL> on pin 1 is missing.
L7510= 0.84v
L7520= 0.84v,
L7550 = 0.35v
USB mouse is lights up
J9000 on pin 4, 6 and 7 have 3.39v
checked resistance to ground on all LVDS_IG_A_DATA_ lines are between 1.2 and 2 ohms.
